attributes.additional_details: I would like this to be taken seriously. It is a very high trafficked road for surrounding areas. Also people still speed in between them or overtake other drivers who are going very slow therefore causing more risk of an accident.
attributes.background: I live in bestwood village NG6 and have for 3 years. One of the main roads (Moor road) has a ridiculous amount of speed bumps. Its ruins the suspension and tyres on everyone’s cars. There is a more built up road nearby that doesn’t even have any. I’m asking for there to be changed to cameras please.
